data.content:
Xayah: The Rebel

Release Date: April 19, 2017

Are you ready to join the rebellion? Meet Xayah, the feisty and agile ADC (Attack Damage Carry) champion in League of Legends. With her sharp feathers and rebellious spirit, Xayah brings a unique playstyle to the game, making her a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

The Story of Xayah

Xayah hails from a race known as the Vastaya, a group of magical creatures who possess both human and animal characteristics. She belongs to the Lhotlan tribe, a group of Vastaya who are known for their exceptional agility and cunning. Xayah's story revolves around her fight against the oppression of her people by the human empire of Noxus.

Driven by her desire for freedom and justice, Xayah became a skilled warrior and a leader of the Vastayan rebellion. She fights alongside her partner, Rakan, a charismatic and mischievous Vastayan who complements her abilities with his own unique skills. Together, they aim to reclaim their people's independence and put an end to the tyranny of Noxus.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Xayah's kit is designed to excel in team fights and skirmishes, making her a formidable ADC choice. Her primary strength lies in her ability to deal massive amounts of damage while simultaneously evading enemy attacks. Let's take a closer look at her abilities:

Passive: Clean Cuts

Xayah's basic attacks and abilities leave behind a feather for a few seconds. These feathers can be retrieved by Xayah, granting her bonus damage on her next few basic attacks. This passive ability allows her to deal burst damage and quickly dispatch enemies.

Q: Double Daggers

Xayah throws two daggers in a line, damaging all enemies they pass through. If the daggers hit an enemy, they will return to Xayah, dealing additional damage on their way back. This ability is great for wave clear and poke damage, making it an essential tool for Xayah's laning phase.

W: Deadly Plumage

When activated, Xayah gains bonus attack speed and causes her next few basic attacks to hit all enemies in a cone in front of her. This ability is perfect for team fights, as it allows Xayah to deal damage to multiple targets simultaneously.

E: Bladecaller

Xayah calls back all her feathers, damaging enemies they pass through. If an enemy is hit by at least three feathers, they are rooted in place for a short duration. This ability is Xayah's primary crowd control tool, allowing her to lock down enemies and secure kills.

R: Featherstorm

Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable for a brief moment. She then rains down a storm of feathers, damaging all enemies in the area. This ultimate ability is a game-changer in team fights, providing Xayah with both damage and survivability.

While Xayah possesses many strengths, she also has a few weaknesses that players should be aware of. One of her main weaknesses is her lack of mobility. Unlike some other ADC champions, Xayah does not have a built-in dash or escape ability, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, her abilities require careful positioning and feather management to maximize their effectiveness, which can be challenging for less experienced players.

Xayah's Place in the Game

Xayah is a popular pick in the ADC role due to her unique playstyle and high damage output. Her ability to deal damage to multiple targets at once makes her a strong team fighter, while her burst damage potential allows her to quickly eliminate squishy targets. Xayah's synergy with her partner Rakan also makes them a deadly duo in the bot lane, as their abilities complement each other and provide excellent engage and disengage potential.

As an ADC, Xayah's primary role is to deal consistent damage throughout the game and carry her team to victory. She excels in the late game when she has acquired her core items and can shred through enemy tanks and squishy targets alike. However, Xayah's early game can be challenging, as she relies heavily on her support to protect her and set up kills.

With her rebellious nature and unique playstyle, Xayah has become a fan-favorite champion in League of Legends. Her sharp feathers and fierce determination make her a force to be reckoned with on the Rift. Whether you're looking to join the Vastayan rebellion or simply want to experience the thrill of playing a high-damage ADC, Xayah is a champion worth mastering.

Visit our website to access detailed information and videos showcasing all of Xayah's stunning skins. From the elegant Cosmic Dusk to the fiery Phoenix, each skin brings a new level of visual flair to this rebellious champion.

Xayah (Broken Covenant Xayah)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 21, 2019

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her agility, precision, and deadly feather attacks, Xayah has become a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay. With her unique abilities and captivating storyline, Xayah has quickly risen to prominence in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Broken Covenant Xayah

Broken Covenant Xayah is a skin that offers a fresh and unique look for the rebellious champion. Released on November 21, 2019, this skin showcases Xayah in a new light, highlighting her darker side and her connection to the mysterious Shadow Isles.

In this skin, Xayah embraces her inner darkness, donning a black and purple outfit adorned with intricate feather patterns. Her feathers, usually vibrant and colorful, now take on a hauntingly beautiful appearance, with a ghostly glow emanating from them. The skin also features new visual effects, including shadowy feathers that trail behind her as she moves and attacks.

The Broken Covenant Xayah skin tells a story of Xayah's journey into the Shadow Isles, a realm known for its eerie and supernatural elements. In this alternate universe, Xayah has made a pact with the spirits of the Shadow Isles, harnessing their power to enhance her abilities and strike fear into her enemies.

The skin's splash art depicts Xayah standing amidst a misty forest, her eyes glowing with an otherworldly light. Her feathers are spread out behind her, creating an ethereal and captivating image. The artwork perfectly captures the essence of the Broken Covenant Xayah skin, showcasing Xayah's transformation into a formidable force of darkness.

Xayah: The Rebel with a Cause

Xayah, the Rebel, was introduced to League of Legends on April 19, 2017. She quickly became a popular pick among players due to her unique playstyle and engaging lore. Xayah is a marksman champion who excels at dealing damage from a distance while also possessing impressive mobility and crowd control abilities.

In the game, Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her feather attacks. Her passive ability,

allows her basic attacks and abilities to leave behind feathers that can be recalled to deal additional damage. This mechanic rewards players who can strategically position themselves to maximize their damage output.

Xayah's ultimate ability,

is a game-changer. When activated, Xayah becomes untargetable and leaps into the air, releasing a storm of feathers that damage and root enemies caught in their path. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and allow Xayah to escape dangerous situations.

However, Xayah also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, making her vulnerable to burst damage and crowd control effects. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that requires practice and skill to master.

In the lore of League of Legends, Xayah is part of a race known as the Vastaya, a group of magical beings with both human and animal characteristics. Xayah, along with her partner Rakan, fights against the oppressive rule of the human empire, seeking to restore freedom and equality to her people.

Xayah's story is one of rebellion and defiance. She is a champion who fights for what she believes in, using her skills and cunning to outmaneuver her enemies. Her determination and unwavering spirit make her a formidable force on the battlefield, and her unique playstyle has endeared her to players around the world.

Explore Xayah's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Xayah and her various appearances in League of Legends, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information, images, and videos showcasing Xayah's different skins, including the captivating Broken Covenant Xayah skin.

Whether you're a fan of Xayah's rebellious nature or simply enjoy her agile and deadly playstyle, exploring her appearances will give you a deeper understanding of this beloved champion. From her base skin to her various alternate looks, each iteration of Xayah offers a unique visual experience that adds to her overall character.

So, dive into the world of Xayah and discover the many facets of this remarkable champion. Whether you choose to embrace her darker side with the Broken Covenant Xayah skin or prefer her more traditional appearances, Xayah is sure to captivate and entertain you with her swift and deadly attacks.

Xayah (Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points

Release Date: April 2021

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her agility, precision, and deadly feather attacks, Xayah has become a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay. With her Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin, she takes on a whole new level of elegance and power, making her an even more formidable force on the battlefield.

The Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin is a special edition skin that was released in April 2021. It is an exclusive skin that can only be obtained by spending 100 Prestige Points, which are earned through various in-game events and missions. This skin is a testament to Xayah's strength and determination, showcasing her as a true warrior of the skies.

The Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin features a stunning new look for the Rebel. Her usual dark feathers are replaced with vibrant, fiery plumage, symbolizing her connection to the mythical phoenix. Her outfit is adorned with intricate golden details, giving her a regal and majestic appearance. The skin also includes new visual effects for her abilities, making her attacks even more visually striking and impactful.

In addition to the visual enhancements, the Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin also comes with unique sound effects and voice lines. Xayah's voice takes on a more commanding tone, reflecting her newfound power and confidence. The sound effects for her abilities are also modified to match the fiery theme of the skin, immersing players in the intense battles that Xayah engages in.

Now, let's delve into the story of Xayah and her place in the League of Legends universe. Xayah is a Vastayan revolutionary who fights against the oppression of her people by the ruling nations. She believes that humans and other non-Vastayan beings are draining the life essence of her kind, and she seeks to reclaim their stolen power. Xayah is accompanied by her partner, Rakan, and together they form a formidable duo on the battlefield.

Xayah's strengths lie in her agility and burst damage. She excels at quickly eliminating squishy targets with her feather attacks and can easily maneuver around the battlefield with her mobility. Her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to become untargetable while dealing damage to enemies in a large area, making her a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

However, Xayah also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. Her abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that requires skill and practice to master. Additionally, Xayah heavily relies on her feathers for damage, so if her feathers are not properly set up or are blocked by enemy champions, her damage output can be significantly reduced.

In the game, Xayah is primarily played as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) in the bot lane. Her ability to deal high burst damage and quickly eliminate priority targets makes her a valuable asset to any team. She synergizes well with supports who can provide crowd control and protection, allowing her to freely unleash her feather attacks without fear of retaliation.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Xayah's various appearances in the game. From her base skin to her other alternate skins, each one offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the fiery elegance of the Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin or the playful charm of her Sweetheart Xayah skin, there is a look for every Xayah enthusiast.

In conclusion, the Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin is a stunning addition to Xayah's repertoire. With its vibrant colors, intricate details, and enhanced visual and sound effects, it truly embodies the power and grace of the Rebel. Whether you're a fan of Xayah's lore or simply enjoy playing her in the game, the Prestige Brave Phoenix Xayah skin is a must-have for any dedicated Xayah player.

Xayah (Arcana Xayah)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 2021

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her sharp feathers and deadly precision, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. And now, she has a new skin that takes her power to a whole new level - Arcana Xayah.

Arcana Xayah is a visually stunning skin that showcases Xayah's mystical and arcane abilities. With its intricate design and vibrant colors, this skin truly stands out on the battlefield. The skin features Xayah adorned in elegant, flowing robes, with feathers that shimmer with magical energy. Her bow and arrows are also transformed, now infused with arcane power, making her attacks even more devastating.

One of the most striking aspects of Arcana Xayah is the visual effects it brings to Xayah's abilities. Her Q ability, Double Daggers, now leaves behind a trail of arcane energy as it slices through her enemies. Her W ability, Deadly Plumage, creates a dazzling display of magical feathers that surround her, enhancing her attack speed and damage. And her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, unleashes a storm of arcane feathers that rain down on her enemies, dealing massive damage.

In addition to the stunning visual effects, Arcana Xayah also features new sound effects that further enhance the skin's mystical theme. From the sound of her arrows whistling through the air to the powerful impact of her abilities, every sound immerses players in the world of arcane power.

Now, let's delve into the story of Xayah and how she fits into the world of League of Legends. Xayah is a Vastayan, a race of magical beings who are deeply connected to nature. She hails from a tribe known as the Lhotlan, who have a strong bond with the land and its creatures. However, the Lhotlan have faced persecution and oppression at the hands of humans, who seek to exploit the Vastayan's magical abilities.

Xayah, fueled by her anger and desire for revenge, has become a rebel against the human regime. She fights to protect her people and reclaim their freedom. With her sharp wit and deadly accuracy, she has become a formidable force on the battlefield. Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her high damage output and mobility. Her feathers can pierce through multiple targets, making her a threat in team fights. However, she is relatively squishy and relies on her agility to avoid taking damage.

In the game, Xayah is primarily played as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) in the bot lane. Her kit revolves around her feathers, which she can summon and control to deal damage to her enemies. Her passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her basic attacks and abilities to leave behind feathers that can be retrieved by her Q ability, Double Daggers. This allows her to deal additional damage and create deadly combos.

Xayah's Q ability, Double Daggers, throws two blades in a line, damaging all enemies hit and leaving behind feathers. Her W ability, Deadly Plumage, enhances her basic attacks, causing them to deal bonus damage and hit in a cone behind her target. Her E ability, Bladecaller, is a skillshot that sends out a wave of feathers, damaging and rooting enemies hit. And her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to become untargetable and unleash a storm of feathers that damage all enemies in the area.

With her unique playstyle and powerful abilities, Xayah has become a popular pick among players who enjoy high-damage ADC champions. Her synergy with her partner, Rakan, another champion in the game, adds an extra layer of strategy and coordination to her gameplay.

If you want to learn more about Xayah and her various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on her champion page. From her base skin to her other skins like Cosmic Dusk Xayah and Sweetheart Xayah, each one offers a unique visual and thematic experience. So, whether you're a fan of her rebellious nature or simply enjoy playing a high-damage ADC, Xayah is a champion worth exploring in the world of League of Legends.

So, gear up with the mystical power of Arcana Xayah and unleash your fury on the Rift. With this skin, you'll not only look stylish but also strike fear into the hearts of your enemies. Get ready to soar through the battlefield with Xayah, the Rebel, and leave a trail of arcane destruction in your wake!

Xayah (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and agile champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As a champion, Xayah has a variety of skins that allow players to customize her appearance and enhance their gaming experience. One of these skins is the

skin, which is the original appearance of Xayah when players first encounter her in the game.

The

skin for Xayah is the base skin that players start with when they first unlock the champion. It showcases Xayah's unique and striking design, reflecting her rebellious nature and her role as a deadly ADC (Attack Damage Carry) in the game. The skin features Xayah wearing her signature outfit, which consists of a feathered hood, a sleek black bodysuit, and intricate feathered gloves. Her weapon of choice, the Deadly Plumage, is also prominently displayed, ready to be unleashed on her enemies.

The

skin perfectly captures Xayah's character and personality. Xayah is a Vastayan, a race of magical beings who are part-human and part-animal. She is known for her sharp wit, fierce determination, and her unwavering loyalty to her partner, Rakan. Xayah's design reflects her rebellious nature, with her striking red eyes, sharp feathers, and sleek black attire. Her outfit is both practical and stylish, allowing her to move swiftly and gracefully on the battlefield while also showcasing her unique style.

In terms of gameplay, Xayah is a highly mobile and burst damage-focused champion. Her abilities allow her to quickly dash around the battlefield, deal massive damage to multiple enemies, and control the flow of team fights. Her passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage and hit multiple enemies in a line. This makes her a formidable threat in team fights, as she can quickly eliminate multiple targets with her deadly feathers.

Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies and control the battlefield. Her Featherstorm ability allows her to become untargetable for a short duration, making her difficult to kill and allowing her to reposition herself in team fights. Additionally, her ability to root enemies with her E ability, Bladecaller, provides crowd control and allows her team to follow up with additional damage. Xayah's ultimate ability, Featherstorm, is a powerful AoE (Area of Effect) ability that deals damage to all enemies in its path, making her a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

However, Xayah also has her weaknesses. She is a relatively squishy champion, meaning that she can be easily killed if caught out of position or focused by the enemy team. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a high skill-cap champion. Players must have good game sense and mechanical skill to fully utilize Xayah's kit and dominate the game.

In the lore of League of Legends, Xayah and Rakan are a pair of lovers who are fighting against the oppressive rule of the human nation of Noxus. They are members of a rebel group called the Lhotlan, who seek to restore the independence and freedom of their Vastayan homeland. Xayah is a passionate and determined rebel, willing to do whatever it takes to achieve her goals. Her story is one of love, sacrifice, and the fight for freedom.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Xayah, including her various skins. Each skin offers a unique visual experience and allows players to further personalize their gameplay. Whether you prefer the original
skin or one of Xayah's many other stunning skins, you can find all the information you need right here.

Xayah (Redeemed Star Guardian Xayah)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 2021

Xayah, the Rebel, has always been known for her fierce and rebellious nature. With her sharp feathers and deadly precision, she has become a force to be reckoned with on the Rift. However, in a surprising turn of events, Xayah has embraced a new role as a Star Guardian, taking on the mantle of the

skin. This stunning skin showcases a different side of Xayah, as she joins the ranks of the Star Guardians in their fight against the darkness.

The

skin features a complete transformation for Xayah, giving her a celestial and ethereal appearance. Her usual dark feathers are replaced with vibrant, glowing feathers in shades of pink and purple. Her outfit is adorned with intricate star patterns and her weapon, the Featherstorm, is now a radiant staff that emits a soft glow. Xayah's recall animation is also updated, showing her surrounded by a beautiful starry sky as she channels her power.

This skin not only changes Xayah's appearance but also adds new visual and sound effects to her abilities. Her Q ability, Double Daggers, now leaves behind a trail of sparkling stardust as it travels through the air. Her W ability, Deadly Plumage, creates a burst of shimmering feathers when activated. Her E ability, Bladecaller, now summons a flurry of starry feathers that trail behind her as she dashes through enemies. Finally, her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, creates a dazzling explosion of stars upon impact.

Now, let's delve into the story of Xayah and how she came to embrace the role of a Star Guardian. Xayah, along with her partner Rakan, were once members of a group known as the Lhotlan Tribe. They fought against the oppression of the Vastaya, seeking to reclaim their freedom and protect their homeland. Xayah's rebellious spirit and determination made her a formidable warrior, but she always believed that the Star Guardians were nothing more than puppets of the cosmic order.

However, during a battle against the forces of darkness, Xayah witnessed the sacrifice and bravery of the Star Guardians firsthand. She saw their unwavering dedication to protecting the universe and realized that they were not mere puppets, but true heroes. This revelation shook Xayah to her core, and she began to question her own beliefs. She realized that she had been fighting against the darkness in her own way, but now she had the opportunity to join forces with the Star Guardians and make an even greater impact.

With her newfound understanding, Xayah decided to embrace the role of a Star Guardian. She underwent a transformation, becoming the

and dedicating herself to the fight against the darkness. Now, she fights alongside the other Star Guardians, using her sharp feathers and deadly precision to protect the universe from the forces of evil.

In the game, Xayah is a marksman champion who excels at dealing damage from a distance. Her passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage and leave behind feathers that can be retrieved with her abilities. Her Q ability, Double Daggers, throws two daggers in a line, damaging all enemies hit and leaving behind feathers. Her W ability, Deadly Plumage, enhances her basic attacks, causing them to deal bonus damage and hit all enemies in a cone in front of her. Her E ability, Bladecaller, sends out a wave of feathers in a line, damaging and rooting enemies hit. Finally, her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to become untargetable and rain down a storm of feathers, damaging all enemies in the area.

Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to deal high burst damage and control the battlefield with her feathers. Her passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her to deal significant damage with her basic attacks, especially when combined with her abilities. Her E ability, Bladecaller, can be used to root multiple enemies, setting up kills for her and her team. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, provides her with a powerful tool for engaging or disengaging from fights, as it makes her untargetable and deals damage to enemies in the area.

However, Xayah also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, as missing her feathers can significantly reduce her damage output. Finally, Xayah relies heavily on her feathers for damage, so if her feathers are not properly set up or are blocked by enemy champions, her damage potential is greatly diminished.

In conclusion, Xayah's

skin offers players a stunning transformation for the Rebel marksman. With her celestial appearance and new visual effects, this skin truly captures the essence of the Star Guardian theme. Whether you're a fan of Xayah or simply looking for a visually appealing skin,
is a must-have addition to your collection. For more information and videos showcasing all of Xayah's appearances, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this captivating champion.

Xayah (Sweetheart Xayah)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: February 14, 2019

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her agility and deadly precision, Xayah has become a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay. With her unique abilities and captivating storyline, Xayah has quickly become an iconic character in the League of Legends universe.

Sweetheart Xayah: A Love Story

Sweetheart Xayah is a skin that was released on February 14, 2019, just in time for Valentine's Day. This skin transforms Xayah into a charming and romantic character, perfect for spreading love and joy on the battlefield. With its vibrant colors and heart-themed design, Sweetheart Xayah is a delightful addition to Xayah's collection of skins.

The Sweetheart Xayah skin features Xayah wearing a beautiful red and white dress adorned with hearts and roses. Her feathers are also transformed into heart-shaped projectiles, adding a touch of romance to her deadly attacks. The skin also includes new visual effects for her abilities, such as heart-shaped feathers for her Q ability, Bladecaller, and heart-shaped explosions for her ultimate ability, Featherstorm.

In addition to the stunning visual changes, Sweetheart Xayah also has new voice lines that reflect her romantic side. From flirtatious taunts to sweet compliments, Xayah's voiceover adds an extra layer of charm to this skin. The attention to detail in both the visual and audio aspects of Sweetheart Xayah truly brings the skin to life and enhances the overall gaming experience.

Xayah: The Rebel with a Cause

Xayah is a champion with a rich backstory and a strong personality. She hails from a race of vastaya, a group of magical creatures who possess both human and animal characteristics. Xayah, along with her partner Rakan, is a member of the Lhotlan tribe, known for their rebellious nature and fierce determination to protect their homeland.

In the game, Xayah is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. Her abilities revolve around her feathers, which she can throw and recall to deal damage to her enemies. Xayah's passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her basic attacks to hit multiple targets in a line, making her a formidable force in team fights.

One of Xayah's defining characteristics is her ability to root enemies with her E ability, Bladecaller. This ability not only deals damage but also immobilizes enemies caught in its path, making it a powerful tool for crowd control. Xayah's ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to become untargetable while firing a flurry of feathers in a cone, damaging and slowing enemies in its wake.

Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies and control team fights with her crowd control abilities. Her high mobility and damage output make her a formidable opponent in the hands of skilled players. However, Xayah's weaknesses include her low health pool and vulnerability to crowd control effects. Players must be mindful of their positioning and timing to maximize Xayah's potential and avoid being caught off guard.

Throughout her journey in the League of Legends universe, Xayah has become a beloved character among players. Her rebellious nature, combined with her unique gameplay mechanics, has made her a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. Whether you're a fan of her lore or enjoy her playstyle, Xayah offers a thrilling and rewarding experience for players of all skill levels.

Explore Xayah's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Xayah and her various appearances in the game, you can find more information and videos on our dedicated page. From her classic look to her charming Sweetheart Xayah skin, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Immerse yourself in the world of Xayah and discover the excitement and thrill of playing as this rebellious champion.

Xayah (Star Guardian Xayah)

costume, which adds a touch of celestial beauty to her already impressive appearance.

skin was released on September 7, 2017, and quickly became a hit among players. The skin features a vibrant color palette, with shades of purple, pink, and gold, giving Xayah an otherworldly aura. The attention to detail in the

skin is truly remarkable. But the

skin is not just about aesthetics. It also comes with unique voice lines and interactions, further enhancing the player's experience. Now, let's delve into the story of Xayah and her place in the League of Legends universe. Xayah is a Vastayan revolutionary who fights against the oppression of her people by the ruling nations. With her partner Rakan, they form a formidable duo, using their agility and teamwork to outmaneuver their enemies. Xayah's abilities revolve around her feathers, which she can throw with deadly accuracy, dealing damage to multiple enemies at once. Xayah's past in the game is filled with conflict and determination. She fights for the freedom of her people, seeking to overthrow the oppressive regime that seeks to control them. Her rebellious nature and unwavering resolve make her a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Xayah's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies and deal massive damage in team fights. Her agility allows her to dodge incoming attacks and reposition herself to gain an advantage. However, she is relatively squishy and relies on her mobility to survive, making her vulnerable if caught off guard.

In the League of Legends game, Xayah is often played as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) in the bot lane. Her high damage output and ability to shred through tanks make her a formidable threat in team fights. With the

skin, players can now experience the thrill of playing as a celestial warrior, bringing a touch of cosmic beauty to their gameplay.

skin. Explore the different skins and discover the unique features and visual effects they offer. Whether you're a fan of Xayah or simply appreciate the artistry behind the skins, this page is a treasure trove of information for all League of Legends players.

Xayah (Cosmic Dusk Xayah)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 19, 2018

Xayah, the Rebel, is a fierce and agile champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her sharp feathers and deadly precision, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. As a champion known for her rebellious nature and strong personality, Xayah has captured the hearts of many players. To further enhance her allure, Riot Games introduced the Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin, offering a stunning and cosmic twist to her appearance.

The Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin was released on April 19, 2018, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Xayah into a celestial being, adorned with cosmic feathers and a mesmerizing color palette. The skin features intricate details and animations that truly bring the cosmic theme to life.

The Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin showcases Xayah in a new light, embodying the essence of the cosmos. Her feathers are now a vibrant shade of purple, with streaks of blue and silver running through them. Her outfit has been redesigned to match the cosmic theme, with a sleek and futuristic appearance. Xayah's abilities also receive a cosmic makeover, with stunning visual effects that leave a trail of stardust in her wake.

In addition to the visual enhancements, the Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin also includes new voice lines and interactions. Xayah's voice takes on a more ethereal tone, adding to the otherworldly feel of the skin. Her taunts, jokes, and interactions with other champions are all tailored to fit the cosmic theme, further immersing players in the celestial realm.

Now, let's delve into the story of Xayah and her place in the League of Legends universe. Xayah is a Vastayan, a race of magical beings who are deeply connected to nature. She hails from a tribe known as the Lhotlan, who have a strong bond with the land and its creatures. However, the Lhotlan have faced persecution and oppression at the hands of humans, leading Xayah to become a fierce rebel fighting for her people's freedom.

Xayah's abilities in the game reflect her rebellious nature and her connection to her feathered allies. Her passive ability, Clean Cuts, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage and strike through enemies in a line. Her Q ability, Double Daggers, throws two blades in a line, damaging and slowing enemies. Her W ability, Deadly Plumage, enhances her basic attacks, granting bonus attack speed and causing her attacks to deal area of effect damage. Xayah's E ability, Bladecaller, sends out a storm of feathers that damage and root enemies. Finally, her ultimate ability, Featherstorm, allows her to become untargetable and unleash a flurry of feathers that damage enemies in a cone.

Xayah's strengths lie in her high burst damage and mobility. With her ability to quickly dash around the battlefield and deal massive damage, she excels at assassinating squishy targets and escaping dangerous situations. Her feather-based abilities also provide her with crowd control and area of effect damage, making her a formidable force in team fights.

However, Xayah does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, meaning she can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that requires practice and skill to master.

In the lore of League of Legends, Xayah and her lover Rakan are on a mission to save their people from the oppression of humans. They believe that the only way to secure the future of the Vastaya is to eliminate the human threat entirely. Xayah is driven by her passion and determination, willing to do whatever it takes to protect her tribe. Her rebellious nature and strong convictions make her a captivating character in the game's lore.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Xayah's appearances, including the Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin. Whether you're a fan of her rebellious personality or simply appreciate her agile playstyle, Xayah is a champion that continues to captivate players. So, embrace the cosmic realm and unleash your inner rebel with the Cosmic Dusk Xayah skin!
